description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Welcome to Story Sender! There are four different types of stories. Green's are pick up lines. Red's are filled with fun facts. Blue's are famous quotes. Purple's are jokes. Discover a world of fun and share it with your friends in an instant. Enjoy!
